channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 27th March
item.description:
28 day with give an take please replace x1 broken sunken kerb 900x150x20mm stats required please note no parking cones will need to be put out prior to works starting 10x6 (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)

item.description:

item.title: Road clearing on or around 149 Hewlett Road, 26th March
item.description:
Having contributed significantly, under all life circumstances, towards organising/clearing the road/drain, from seasonal leaves and debris frequently over 14 years in my home and as getting assistance hasnt always been as easy of recent. I feel this also impacts upon others in this part of the area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 149, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham

item.title: Car abandoned/stolen, 26th March
item.description:
Not sure if this car has been stolen or dumped as most of the tyres are flat and it's not moved in quite long time. Wouldn't want someone to be missing it if stolen.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crack willow trees overhanging public footpath, 26th March
item.description:
These trees are leaning heavily and in danger of falling across a well-used footpath, often with schoolchildren and mothers with pushchairs. They also threaten to damage a streetlight whose light they mostly now block and might also damage cars parked on the drives of 130 or 132 Abbotswood Road. This matter has been reported in the past but no action taken and the situation is now much worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbotswood Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
